radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver appears heterogeneous, with areas of hypoattenuation compatible with fatty infiltration. There is a 17-mm mid polar hypodensity in the right kidney. No abdominal, retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy is noted. Mild sigmoid diverticulosis. A sclerotic area in the left eighth posterior rib may be a bone island. The visible osseous structures show no fractures. Diffuse idiopathic skeletal hyperostosis of the lower thoracic spine.
